    Moneyball Moments

    By Grant Nielson

    In Moneyball Moments, I share with you my insights on the sports analytics world - what is the advanced data telling us? Does it actually matter? How does this affect my favorite team? and other vizualisations, models, and insights that might just lead you to have your own Moneyball Moments.
